Description: Service account to be set at instance creation

* Number and type of GPU's to be provided on the Instance. See `GPU's on Comoute Engine <https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/gpus/>`_.* The number of GPU dies is linked to the number of CPU cores and memory selected for this instance.
Default behavior is to Live Migrate. See `Setting Instance Availability Policies <https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/instances/setting-instance-scheduling-options>`_.
